ARABIC: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have they not reflected? Their companion is not mad. He is only a clear warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have they not bethought themselves their companion is not mad? He is only a plain admonisher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have they not pondered that their companion [i.e. the Prophet Muhammad] is not afflicted with insanity? He is only a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Why will they not understand that their companion (Muhammad) is not possessed by jinn. (Muhammad) is only a (Divinely) authorized preacher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they not ponder that their companion is far removed from insanity? In fact he is clearly a Herald of Warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they not reflect There is no madness in their companion. He is but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do they not reflect that their companion has not unsoundness in mind; he is only a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have they not reflected? No madness is in their comrade; he is naught but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have they not bethought them (that) there is no madness in their comrade? He is but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have they not reflected that their companion is not mad? He is only a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Reflect they not that in their companions there is no madness! he is naught but a manifest warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they not reflected that there is no madness in their companion, [and that] he is just a manifest warner?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they not reflect? Their companion is not seized with madness: he is but a perspicuous warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they not reflect? There is no madness in their companion (Muhammad SAW). He is but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have they not reflected? There is no madness in their companion, he is but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they not think? There is no madness in their friend. He is but a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then do they not give thought? There is in their companion [Muhammad] no madness. He is not but a clear warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:184] Have they not considered, and so realised that, that there is no madness in their comrade, Muhammad (s)? He is but a clear warner, one whose warning is evident.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have they not bethought them) among themselves that Muhammad (pbuh) was not a sorcerer, soothsayer or a madman. Then Allah, Exalted is He, said: ((that) there is no madness) there is no touch of madness whatsoever (in their comrade) in their Prophet? (He is but a plain warner) and Messenger who explains to them in a language they understand.
